在故事里，龙会飞。: 我看见一只老鼠，它跑得很快。
Wǒ kànjiàn yì zhī lǎoshǔ, tā pǎo de hěn kuài.
I saw a mouse; it ran very fast.
The cat is sunbathing by the window.

在故事里，龙会飞。: 这只狗不大，可是很友好。
Zhè zhī gǒu bù dà, kěshì hěn yǒuhǎo.
This dog isn’t big, but it’s very friendly.

Nóngchǎng lǐ yǒu yì zhī zhū.
There is a pig on the farm.

Niú zài chī cǎo, wǒmen bié chǎo tā.
The cow is eating grass; let’s not disturb it.

在故事里，龙会飞。: 动物园里有老虎，也有熊猫。
Dòngwùyuán lǐ yǒu lǎohǔ, yě yǒu xióngmāo.
In the zoo there are tigers and also pandas.

Tā huì qí mǎ, dànshì wǒ bù huì.
He can ride a horse, but I can’t.

Zhè zhī yáng máo hěn duō, hěn nuǎnhuo.
This sheep has lots of wool; it’s very warm.

在故事里，龙会飞。: 猴子喜欢吃水果，还会爬树。
Hóuzi xǐhuan chī shuǐguǒ, hái huì pá shù.
Monkeys like eating fruit and can also climb trees.

Zǎoshang wǒ tīngjiàn jī zài jiào.
In the morning I heard a chicken crowing.

在故事里，龙会飞。: 熊看起来很大，我们离远一点。
Xióng kànqǐlái hěn dà, wǒmen lí yuǎn yìdiǎn.
The bear looks big; let’s stay a bit farther away.

Huā pángbiān yǒu mìfēng zài fēi.
There are bees flying near the flowers.

Nà zhī niǎo fēi dào shù shàng qù le.
That bird flew up into the tree.

在故事里，龙会飞。: 鸭子在水里游泳，很安静。
Yāzi zài shuǐ lǐ yóuyǒng, hěn ānjìng.
The duck is swimming in the water; it’s very calm.

在故事里，龙会飞。: 熊猫正在吃竹子，看起来很开心。
Xióngmāo zhèngzài chī zhúzi, kànqǐlái hěn kāixīn.
The panda is eating bamboo and looks happy.

在故事里，龙会飞。: 下雨以后，青蛙在水边叫。
Xiàyǔ yǐhòu, qīngwā zài shuǐbiān jiào.
After it rains, frogs croak by the water.

在故事里，龙会飞。: 兔子跑得很快，我追不上。
Tùzi pǎo de hěn kuài, wǒ zhuī bù shàng.
The rabbit runs fast; I can’t catch up.
